NEW! Course Wizard – learn what you want by creating your own vocabulary course.

What is Course Wizard?
Lingvist’s Course Wizard lets you quickly create, customize, and share the vocabulary course you need. It's smart and personal, with featur
If you want to learn faster, you need a speedy and reliable app. That's what this update brings.

We have added some nice improvements to our course focuses, including a progress ring so you can see your progress and a new screen showing highlights of each focus. Add a few improvements to our new Course Wizard feature, sprinkle some performance enhanc
This update has a few design tweaks and performance improvements. Bugs were squished. Fixes were made.
The app is more stable. The reliability has been significantly improved. Your learning just got faster.

We have updated the app to give you more control over what you learn and when you learn it: you can now choose which course focuses to learn from, whether a single one or a mixture of your interests. It's your learning experience, after all.
If you want to learn faster, you need a speedy and reliable app. That's what this update brings.
Changes and improvements. Do you like them? So do we. Keep your updates turned on and keep on learning!
Thank you for using Lingvist. Bugs were fixed, and even killed, so that you can continue learning faster with us.
Fixed what needed fixing and squished some bugs. Fixed things and squished bugs lead to faster learning.

You want it darker? We will now follow your systemwide preferences for turning Dark Mode on at sunset or a specific time.
